name: Night-Wind Architecture: Needs of Exchange
description: A large stone building unique to the Masters of the Night-Wind, featuring independent open-air balconies and distinctive blue flags.\nCompared to similar structures, this type of building has a more spacious exterior, making it ideal for meetings, exhibitions, and other public activities. Due to these features, organizations like the "Graffiti Alliance," which require open public lessons, have set up their headquarters in such buildings.
